name: Geordi Taylor
headline: Bridging the gap between sustainable energy and enterprise data privacy.
bio: I'm a Senior Product Manager specializing in complex SaaS implementations and the intersection of energy policy and technology. Currently driving enterprise-wide initiatives at Con Edison.
narrativeIntro: My career has been defined by a constant pursuit of complex systemsâ€”from co-founding a biofuels startup to publishing energy policy research at Bloomberg, shaping fintech platforms at Morgan Stanley, and now steering digital transformation at one of the world's largest energy companies.

development.context: Immersive study in Germany focused on global economics and international business.
Professional education in data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy) and backend database management.

languages.context: Advanced professional working proficiency; Minor in French from Pace University.
Basic conversational proficiency developed during immersion at the University of Mannheim.
